review_text: I remember my mom having one of these when I was a child - over 35+ years ago! I knew what I wanted and was THRILLED to have found the EXACT product I desired at a price that was reasonable. The color isn't important but function is. It holds jalepeno peppers and make it easy to access them - 'cause the jars are not user friendly!
product_name: Tupperware Large Pick a Deli Container
